Title: Establishes a state crisis intervention demonstration program and a crisis intervention team training fund
Summary: Establishes a state crisis intervention demonstration program and a crisis intervention team training fund.
LawCode: Add §§7.51 & 7.53, amd §19.07, Ment Hyg L; add §99-ii, St Fin L; add §209-gg, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, the state finance law and the general municipal law, in relation to establishing a state crisis intervention demonstration program and a crisis intervention team training fund
